channel.title: Inching Away's Client Compiler
channel.description:
Posted it a while back ago before JDB's rampage:
[code]@echo off Title Inching Away's client runner and compiler :index cls echo Welcome to Inching Away's client runner and compiler. echo. echo 1. Type in c to compile your client. echo. echo 2. Type in r to run your client. echo. echo 3. Type in e to exit the program. echo. set /p opt=Option: if %opt%==c goto compiler if %opt%==C goto compiler if %opt%==r goto runner if %opt%==R goto runner if %opt%==e goto exit if %opt%==E goto exit if %opt%==* goto error goto error :compiler cls title Client compiler echo Compiling... echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.0.1\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto index :runner Title Client Runner cls echo Running... echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.0.1\bin\javac.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java pause goto index :exit Title Exit cls echo Thank you for using Inching Away's compiler and runner. echo. pause exit :error Title Error Encountered cls echo You have typed in an unknown option. echo Please try again. echo. pause goto index[/code]

item.title: Inching Away's Client Compiler
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Posted it a while back ago before JDBâ€™s rampage:

@echo off Title Inching Away's client runner and compiler :index cls echo Welcome to Inching Away's client runner and compiler. echo. echo 1. Type in c to compile your client. echo. echo 2. Type in r to run your client. echo. echo 3. Type in e to exit the program. echo. set /p opt=Option: if %opt%==c goto compiler if %opt%==C goto compiler if %opt%==r goto runner if %opt%==R goto runner if %opt%==e goto exit if %opt%==E goto exit if %opt%==* goto error goto error :compiler cls title Client compiler echo Compiling... echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.0.1\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto index :runner Title Client Runner cls echo Running... echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.0.1\bin\javac.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" Xmx1024m . *.java pause goto index :exit Title Exit cls echo Thank you for using Inching Away's compiler and runner. echo. pause exit :error Title Error Encountered cls echo You have typed in an unknown option. echo Please try again. echo. pause goto index
